root: ^oh, thank you! ...normal people just say 'birthday', merry.
^Yeah, yeah, but "birth anniversary" sounds special and important!
^(i thought birthdays were special and important by default? lmao)
^Here's your birthday breakfast! It's pancaffles, exactly how you like them.
^ah, yes, my favorite chaotic mess of a meal: P A N C A F F L E S
^you know the way to my heart, merry...
^So, there's good news and bad news... what do you want first?

c-0: ^Well, the good news is that everyone made and ordered you presents!
^Unfortunately, the dude who was supposed to deliver them to us crashed into a tree, so a bunch of your presents were scattered around the forest.
^Yeah, he's fine. I gave him an ice pack.
c-1: ^Well, the bad news is that the mailman crashed into a tree, so a bunch of your presents got scattered around the forest.
^Yes, he's fine. I gave him an ice pack. The good news is that everyone remembered your birthday!

cont: ^You should go around and find your presents.
^birthdays are, like, the one day I have an actual excuse to be lazyyyy...
^Hey, it can be like an adventure!
^An *Epic Quest* to find your gifts. A BIRTH ANNIVERSARY QUEST!
^Alright, no time to waste! Get going on your quest!
^NO!! I just remembered one of the gifts is, um, time-sensitive! And maybe falling-down-from-tall-heights-sensitive as well...
^I'd join you, but I should probably make sure this guy isn't concussed. And that he doesn't sue us, because technically, the tree he flew into is on our property...
^(Also, it takes forever to clean the leaves out of my Sick Wheels, and the forest doesn't come with a convenient amount of wheelchair ramps.)
^(A convenient amount being even a Single Gosh Darn Wheelchair Ramp.)
^i'll build them eventualllyyyy oh my gooood it's my birthdayyyyy
